DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare change visual acuity patient post surgical cystoid macular edema treat two different regimen .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Post-surgical Cystoid Macular Edema With Topical Steroids Trial ( TEMPEST-1 )
DOC.detailed_description: Compare mean change BCVA 12 week Prednisolone Acetate 1 % q1h ( every hour ) WA ( While Awake ) + Ketorolac 0.5 % qid ( four time day ) versus Prednisolone Acetate qid + Ketorolac qid post surgical cystoid macular edema .

Any patient retinal disease know cause macular edema ( choroidal neovascularization , vein occlusion , diabetic macular edema study eye ) . Patients nonexudative Age Related Macular Degeneration ( ARMD ) nonproliferative diabetic retinopathy without macular edema include study . Other reason decrease visual acuity ( amblyopia , foveal atrophy , optic atrophy ) .
